author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kissei Pharmaceutical to repurchase up to 3.7 pct shares and retire treasury shares
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Kissei Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it will repurchase up to 1.8 million shares, representing 3.7 percent of outstanding, for up to 5.02 billion yen, through ToSTNeT-3, on Feb. 13
* Says it will retire 2.5 million shares (4.6 percent of outstanding) of its common stock on March 9
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/XYKtnw
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
